parameters.name: EnvType
parameters.description:
The environment of the workspace. Valid values:

*   Prod: production environment
*   Dev: development environment

parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the workflows. You can query multiple workflows at a time by workflow ID.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the workflow. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description: The account ID of the workflow owner.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The field used for sorting. Fields such as TriggerTime and StartedTime are supported. The value of this parameter is in the Sort field + Sort by (Desc/Asc) format. By default, results are sorted in ascending order. Valid values:

*   ModifyTime (Desc/Asc)
*   CreateTime (Desc/Asc)
*   Id (Desc/Asc)

Default value: Id Desc.

parameters.name: TriggerType
parameters.description:
The trigger type.

*   Scheduler
*   Manual
*   TriggerWorkflow
